name: BandSite Project
description: Created a responsive bandsite project with simple Html and Vanila Javascript

name: BrainFlix Project
description: Created a real-time image streaming platform with react.js and kept back-end in filesystem

name: SafeCurrency DB
description: Engineered a cutting-edge SafeCurrency platform utilizing OAUTH-JWT authentication, enabling seamless real-time 98% accurate currency conversions, and facilitating international money transfers for users using Stripe.

name: InStock
description: Developed a full-stack Inventory management system with CI/CD flow using React-native, HTML, SCSS, Express.Js, MYSQL, and Knex, and updated team members on GitHub by creating /merging branches

name: Bucket-List
description: A BucketList maintained for a single person where you can update,delete your list of desires

name: Ecommerce
description: An eCommerce platform featuring user login and signup functionality, supporting a catalog of 36 static items. Users can add or remove items from their shopping cart, with all cart operations and user data managed by a MongoDB database.
